statements: SELECT * FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT id, user_id FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT amount, frequency FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT user_id, next_payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE frequency = 'monthly';
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount >= 100;
SELECT id, user_id, amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, frequency FROM recurring_payments WHERE next_payment_date < '2022-05-01';
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments ORDER BY next_payment_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_payments FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, frequency FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE frequency LIKE 'qu%';
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE next_payment_date >= '2022-06-01' AND next_payment_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE user_id = 10 AND frequency = 'weekly' ORDER BY next_payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE next_payment_date = (SELECT MAX(next_payment_date) FROM recurring_payments);
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount > 100 AND frequency = 'Monthly';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 500;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_payments FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_payments DESC;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE next_payment_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT user_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT DISTINCT frequency FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_payments FROM recurring_payments WHERE frequency = 'Weekly' GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 AND frequency = 'Monthly';
SELECT user_id, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING min_amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments ORDER BY next_payment_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_amount < 150;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE user_id = 123 AND frequency = 'Yearly';
SELECT user_id, MIN(next_payment_date) AS next_due_date FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_amount > 75;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE amount < 50 OR amount > 200;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(DISTINCT frequency) AS num_frequencies FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_frequencies DESC;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE next_payment_date BETWEEN '2022-12-01' AND '2023-01-01';
SELECT user_id, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE frequency = 'Monthly' GROUP BY user_id HAVING avg_amount < 100;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE frequency IN ('Monthly', 'Quarterly');
SELECT user_id, MAX(next_payment_date) AS latest_payment_date FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY user_id HAVING latest_payment_date < '2022-12-15';
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id FROM payment_history;
SELECT payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE customer_id = 456;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount < 500;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status = 'completed';
SELECT payment_id, customer_id FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount = 2000;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status = 'pending';
SELECT payment_id, customer_id FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id = 123 AND payment_amount > 500;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount < 1000;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status = 'failed';
SELECT payment_id, customer_id FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount >= 1000;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT payment_id, customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status = 'successful';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(payment_id) AS total_payments FROM payment_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_payments > 5;
SELECT r.payment_id, r.customer_id, r.payment_amount, h.payment_status FROM recurring_payments r INNER JOIN payment_history h ON r.payment_id = h.payment_id;
SELECT r.customer_id, MAX(r.payment_amount) AS highest_payment FROM recurring_payments r GROUP BY r.customer_id;
SELECT r.customer_id, AVG(r.payment_amount) AS avg_payment FROM recurring_payments r GROUP BY r.customer_id HAVING avg_payment > 100;

SELECT customer_id, payment_date, SUM(payment_amount) AS total_amount FROM (SELECT * FROM recurring_payments UNION ALL SELECT * FROM payment_history) AS combined_payments GROUP BY customer_id, payment_date;
SELECT r.customer_id, r.payment_amount, h.payment_status FROM recurring_payments r LEFT JOIN payment_history h ON r.payment_id = h.payment_id;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(payment_amount) AS highest_payment FROM (SELECT * FROM recurring_payments UNION ALL SELECT * FROM payment_history) AS combined_payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status = 'successful' GROUP BY customer_id, payment_date;
SELECT r.customer_id, COUNT(h.payment_id) AS total_payments FROM recurring_payments r LEFT JOIN payment_history h ON r.payment_id = h.payment_id GROUP BY r.customer_id;
SELECT r.customer_id, MIN(r.payment_amount) AS lowest_payment FROM recurring_payments r GROUP BY r.customer_id HAVING lowest_payment < 50;
SELECT r.payment_id, r.customer_id, h.payment_status FROM recurring_payments r RIGHT JOIN payment_history h ON r.payment_id = h.payment_id;

SELECT customer_id, payment_date, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_amount FROM (SELECT * FROM recurring_payments UNION ALL SELECT * FROM payment_history) AS combined_payments GROUP BY customer_id, payment_date;

SELECT r.customer_id, SUM(r.payment_amount) AS total_amount, COUNT(h.payment_id) AS total_payments FROM recurring_payments r LEFT JOIN payment_history h ON r.payment_id = h.payment_id GROUP BY r.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, MAX(payment_amount) AS highest_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status = 'failed' GROUP BY customer_id, payment_date;
SELECT r.payment_id, r.customer_id, r.payment_amount, h.payment_status FROM recurring_payments r LEFT JOIN payment_history h ON r.payment_id = h.payment_id WHERE h.payment_status = 'failed';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(DISTINCT payment_date) AS unique_payment_dates FROM payment_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING unique_payment_dates > 1;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT SUM(payment_amount) AS total_payments FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT * FROM payment_methods;
SELECT method_name, card_number FROM payment_methods WHERE customer_id = 200;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_methods FROM payment_methods;
SELECT * FROM payment_history;
SELECT payment_id, payment_status FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_payments FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status = 'Successful';
SELECT payment_id, next_payment_date FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments INNER JOIN payment_history ON recurring_payments.payment_id = payment_history.payment_id;
SELECT rp.payment_id, pm.method_name FROM recurring_payments rp JOIN payment_methods pm ON rp.customer_id = pm.customer_id;
SELECT ph.history_id, rp.payment_amount FROM payment_history ph LEFT JOIN recurring_payments rp ON ph.payment_id = rp.payment_id;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE method_name LIKE 'Visa%';
SELECT * FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM recurring_payments UNION SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM payment_methods;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) AS total_payments FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT ph.history_id, COUNT(*) AS total_payments FROM payment_history ph JOIN recurring_payments rp ON ph.payment_id = rp.payment_id GROUP BY ph.history_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(payment_amount) AS avg_payment_amount FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE method_name LIKE '%Visa%'
SELECT payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT method_name, card_number FROM payment_methods WHERE customer_id = 123
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_date < '2022-10-01'
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status = 'Success'
SELECT customer_id, payment_date FROM recurring_payments JOIN payment_history ON recurring_payments.payment_id = payment_history.payment_id
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, next_payment_date FROM payment_history WHERE payment_status = 'Pending'
SELECT customer_id, card_number FROM payment_methods WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE method_name NOT LIKE '%PayPal%'
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id = 456
SELECT customer_id, payment_status FROM payment_history ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE customer_id = 789 AND payment_date < '2022-11-01'
SELECT customer_id, card_number FROM payment_methods WHERE method_name = 'MasterCard'
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT payment_id, payment_status FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date = '2022-08-15'
SELECT customer_id, payment_date, next_payment_date FROM recurring_payments JOIN payment_history ON recurring_payments.payment_id = payment_history.payment_id
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE customer_id IN (123, 456, 789) AND expiration_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > (SELECT AVG(payment_amount) FROM recurring_payments)
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT id, user_id, payment_amount, payment_frequency FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, name, email, phone_number FROM users;
SELECT * FROM payment_history;
SELECT history_id, payment_date, amount_paid, user_id FROM payment_history;
SELECT * FROM payment_methods;
SELECT method_id, method_name, user_id FROM payment_methods;
SELECT user_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, name FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, payment_date FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, method_name FROM payment_methods WHERE method_name = 'Credit Card';
SELECT user_id, name, amount_paid FROM users JOIN payment_history ON users.user_id = payment_history.user_id;
SELECT r.user_id, r.payment_amount, p.payment_date FROM recurring_payments r JOIN payment_history p ON r.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT u.name, ph.amount_paid, pm.method_name FROM users u JOIN payment_history ph ON u.user_id = ph.user_id JOIN payment_methods pm ON u.user_id = pm.user_id;

SELECT u.name, r.payment_amount, p.payment_date, pm.method_name FROM users u JOIN recurring_payments r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN payment_history p ON r.user_id = p.user_id JOIN payment_methods pm ON u.user_id = pm.user_id;

SELECT u.name AS customer_name, r.payment_amount AS recurring_payment_amount, p.amount_paid AS payment_amount FROM users u JOIN recurring_payments r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN payment_history p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS recurring_payments_count FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT MAX(payment_amount) AS max_payment_amount FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT u.name, SUM(p.amount_paid) AS total_paid_amount FROM users u JOIN payment_history p ON u.user_id = p.user_id GROUP BY u.name;
SELECT p.method_name, AVG(r.payment_amount) AS avg_payment_amount FROM payment_methods p JOIN recurring_payments r ON p.user_id = r.user_id GROUP BY p.method_name;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100
SELECT user_id, name FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%example.com'
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE amount_paid BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE user_id = 1003
SELECT users.user_id, users.name, payment_history.amount_paid FROM users JOIN payment_history ON users.user_id = payment_history.user_id
SELECT users.name, payment_amount FROM users JOIN recurring_payments ON users.user_id = recurring_payments.user_id WHERE payment_amount >= 200
SELECT users.name, payment_amount FROM users JOIN recurring_payments ON users.user_id = recurring_payments.user_id WHERE payment_frequency = 'monthly'
SELECT users.name, method_name FROM users JOIN payment_methods ON users.user_id = payment_methods.user_id WHERE method_name = 'Credit Card'
SELECT users.name, payment_amount FROM users JOIN recurring_payments ON users.user_id = recurring_payments.user_id WHERE payment_amount > 100 AND payment_frequency = 'weekly'
SELECT users.name, payment_date, amount_paid FROM users JOIN payment_history ON users.user_id = payment_history.user_id WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT payment_history.amount_paid, payment_date FROM payment_history JOIN users ON users.user_id = payment_history.user_id WHERE users.name = 'Alice'
SELECT users.name, payment_history.amount_paid FROM users JOIN payment_history ON users.user_id = payment_history.user_id WHERE users.name LIKE 'J%'
SELECT users.name, payment_amount FROM users JOIN recurring_payments ON users.user_id = recurring_payments.user_id WHERE payment_amount > 150 ORDER BY payment_amount DESC
SELECT users.name, payment_date, payment_amount FROM users JOIN payment_history ON users.user_id = payment_history.user_id WHERE payment_amount < 50 OR payment_amount > 200
SELECT users.name, payment_date, method_name FROM users JOIN payment_history ON users.user_id = payment_history.user_id JOIN payment_methods ON users.user_id = payment_methods.user_id
SELECT users.name, payment_amount, payment_frequency FROM users JOIN recurring_payments ON users.user_id = recurring_payments.user_id WHERE payment_frequency IN ('monthly', 'quarterly')
SELECT users.name, payment_amount, payment_frequency FROM users LEFT JOIN recurring_payments ON users.user_id = recurring_payments.user_id
SELECT users.name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM users RIGHT JOIN payment_history ON users.user_id = payment_history.user_id
SELECT users.name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM users FULL JOIN payment_history ON users.user_id = payment_history.user_id
SELECT users.name, COUNT(payment_amount) AS payments_count FROM users JOIN recurring_payments ON users.user_id = recurring_payments.user_id GROUP BY users.name HAVING payments_count > 2
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT id, customer_id, payment_amount FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT customer_id, payment_frequency FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT id, name FROM customers;
SELECT email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM payments_history;
SELECT id, payment_id, payment_date FROM payments_history;
SELECT status, failure_reason FROM payments_history;
SELECT * FROM payment_methods;
SELECT customer_id, payment_type FROM payment_methods;
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM payment_methods;
SELECT * FROM notifications;
SELECT customer_id, notification_type FROM notifications;
SELECT message, sent_date FROM notifications;
SELECT rp.id, c.name, pm.payment_type FROM recurring_payments rp JOIN customers c ON rp.customer_id = c.id JOIN payment_methods pm ON c.id = pm.customer_id;

SELECT ch.id, ch.payment_date, ch.status, cn.card_number FROM payments_history ch JOIN payment_methods pm ON ch.payment_id = pm.id JOIN customers c ON pm.customer_id = c.id JOIN payment_methods cn ON c.id = cn.customer_id AND pm.card_number = cn.card_number;
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE 'john_doe%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM payments_history WHERE status = 'failed';
SELECT * FROM payment_methods WHERE expiration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM recurring_payments WHERE payment_amount > 100 AND payment_frequency = 'monthly';
SELECT customers.name, payments_history.payment_date FROM customers JOIN payments_history ON customers.id = payments_history.payment_id;
SELECT payment_id, COUNT(*) as TotalPayments FROM payments_history GROUP BY payment_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT recurring_payments.id, notifications.notification_type FROM recurring_payments LEFT JOIN notifications ON recurring_payments.customer_id = notifications.customer_id;
SELECT customers.name, payments_history.payment_date FROM customers INNER JOIN payments_history ON customers.id = payments_history.payment_id WHERE payments_history.status = 'successful';
SELECT customers.name, payment_methods.payment_type FROM customers INNER JOIN payment_methods ON customers.id = payment_methods.customer_id WHERE payment_methods.expiration_date > NOW();

SELECT payments_history.payment_date, payments_history.status, payments_history.failure_reason FROM payments_history WHERE payments_history.status = 'failed' AND payments_history.failure_reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY payments_history.payment_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT customers.name, notifications.notification_type, notifications.sent_date FROM customers JOIN notifications ON customers.id = notifications.customer_id WHERE notifications.sent_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customers.name, payment_methods.card_number FROM customers JOIN payment_methods ON customers.id = payment_methods.customer_id ORDER BY customers.name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT payment_type FROM payment_methods;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(payment_amount) as max_payment_amount FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(payment_amount) as avg_payment_amount FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(payment_amount) > 50;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) as total_customers FROM recurring_payments;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_notifications FROM notifications GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_notifications > 2;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(*) as total_failed_payments FROM payments_history WHERE status = 'failed' GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, MIN(payment_amount) as min_payment_amount FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT payments_history.status, COUNT(*) as total_payments FROM payments_history GROUP BY payments_history.status;

SELECT customers.name, payments_history.payment_date, payments_history.status FROM customers INNER JOIN payments_history ON customers.id = payments_history.payment_id WHERE payments_history.payment_date < NOW();
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, SUM(payment_amount) as total_amount_paid FROM recurring_payments GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, payment_type, COUNT(*) as total_cards FROM payment_methods GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_cards > 1;
